thread.title: Great Hotel in midtown
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in midtown - Review of HGU New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kathleenmY2876SZ
title: Great Hotel in midtown
text: What a great find the HGU was. Rooms were small but very clean and well appointed. Staff is super friendly and made our stay great. Only disappointment was that the lounge closed at 11:00 pm on a Friday night. Would have been nice to sit and have a drink after the concert. Will definitely return to this hotel
